pr_title: Add Muzzle reference creation for interfaces

timeline.message:
Add Muzzle reference creation for interfaces

This will allow muzzle to fail if an implemented interface is missing.

timeline.bodyText: Seems like an unrelated change and a net negative.
timeline.author: richardstartin

timeline.bodyText: Doesn't produce the same result as before. In fact, I can't see and therefore reason about what it does produce any more. We have an annotation from a library which messes with IDE integrations so we can avoid a one liner.
timeline.author: richardstartin

replies.bodyText: I can revert the lombok change, but it was useful when trying to debug this problem as the previous toString only printed the name.
replies.author: tylerbenson

timeline.bodyText: this is inconsistent with behaviour elsewhere in the class where the value -1 is used when no line number is known.
timeline.author: richardstartin

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure that the existing behaviour is correct. Line numbers will be missing if code has been passed through an obfuscator, for instance, in which case MethodVisitor.visitLineNumber wouldn't be entered, and line number 0 may be a better fallback value than -1.
replies.author: richardstartin

replies.bodyText: This only matters for our own code, so the case of an obfuscator doesn't likely apply.  I don't care between -1 and 0, but I did extract it out to a static final.
replies.author: tylerbenson

timeline.bodyText: This is also an unrelated change... I uncommented it to verify it still worked and found it didn't, so I updated it here.
timeline.author: tylerbenson

timeline.message:
Add Muzzle reference creation for interfaces

This will allow muzzle to fail if an implemented interface is missing.

Add Muzzle reference creation for interfaces

This will allow muzzle to fail if an implemented interface is missing.

timeline.bodyText: Why was this committed with this PR?
timeline.author: richardstartin

replies.bodyText: Yes, agreed.  That seems completely unrelated and should not be in this PR.
replies.author: dougqh

replies.bodyText: it is unrelated to the pr.  I made this change to troubleshoot some build failures, but the build passed following this change.  It seems like a useful and very minor change so I left it in.
replies.author: tylerbenson
